verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, When either man or <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H6381>make<s%> a special <S%H5087>vow<s%>, the <S%H5088>vow<s%> of a <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%>, to <S%H5144>separate<s%> himself unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>,

he shall <S%H5144>separate<s%> himself from <S%H3196>wine<s%> and strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>; he shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> no <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, or <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> of strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>, neither shall he <S%H8354>drink<s%> any <S%H4952>juice<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%>, nor <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3892>fresh<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%> or <S%H3002>dried<s%>.

All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> shall he <S%H398>eat<s%> nothing that is <S%H6213>made<s%> of <S%H1612>the<s%> <S%H3196>grape-vine<s%>, from the <S%H2785>kernels<s%> even to the <S%H2085>husk<s%>.

All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5088>vow<s%> of <S%H5145>separation<s%> there shall no <S%H8593>razor<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>: until the <S%H3117>days<s%> be <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>, in which he <S%H5144>separateth<s%> himself unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, he shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%>; he shall let the <S%H6545>locks<s%> of the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> grow <S%H1431>long<s%>.
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> that he <S%H5144>separateth<s%> himself unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> he shall not <S%H935>come<s%> near to a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body<s%>.

He shall not make himself <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for his <S%H1>father<s%>, or for his <S%H517>mother<s%>, for his <S%H251>brother<s%>, or for his <S%H269>sister<s%>, when they <S%H4194>die<s%>; because his <S%H5145>separation<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> is upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>.
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> he is <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And if any <S%H4191>man<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6621>very<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> beside <S%H2930>him<s%>, and he defile the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%>; then he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%>, on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall he shave <S%H1548>it<s%>.

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtle-doves<s%>, or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%>, to the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H834>him<s%>, for that he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> by reason of the <S%H5315>dead<s%>, and shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> that same <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5144>separate<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%>, and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H3532>he-lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old for a <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>; but the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall be <S%H5307>void<s%>, because his <S%H5145>separation<s%> was <S%H2930>defiled<s%>.

And this is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%>, <S%H3117>when<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>: he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>:

and he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>he-lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3535>ewe-lamb<s%> <S%H1323>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>,

and a <S%H5536>basket<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and their <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, and their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>present<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and his <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>:

and he shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, with the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>: the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> also the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> <S%H5262>thereof<s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H784>fire<s%> which is under the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1311>boiled<s%> <S%H2220>shoulder<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafer<s%>, and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them upon the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> he hath <S%H1548>shaven<s%> the head of his <S%H5145>separation<s%>;

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; this is <S%H6944>holy<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, together with <S%H8573>the<s%> <S%H2373>wave-breast<s%> and <S%H8641>heave<s%>- <S%H7785>thigh<s%>: and <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> may <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> who <S%H5087>voweth<s%>, and of his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for his <S%H5145>separation<s%>, besides that which he is <S%H3027>able<s%> to <S%H5381>get<s%>: <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H5088>vow<s%> which he <S%H5087>voweth<s%>, so he must <S%H6213>do<s%> after the <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and unto his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, On this <S%H3541>wise<s%> ye shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: ye shall say unto <S%H559>them<s%>,
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H8104>thee<s%>, and keep thee:
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> make his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> upon <S%H2603>thee<s%>, and be gracious unto thee:
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6440>countenance<s%> upon <S%H7760>thee<s%>, and give thee <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
So shall they <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> upon the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and I will bless <S%H1288>them<s%>.
